FuncDef: The display igmp interface command displays IGMP configurations and state information on interfaces. The display igmp interface command displays IGMP configurations and state information on interfaces.
CLIs: display igmp { vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | all-instance } interface [ <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> ] [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays IGMP configurations and state information on an interface that has the specified type and number.
interface-type interface-number specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Displays detailed IGMP configurations and state information.
-

Displays IGMP configurations and state information in a specified VPN instance.
vpn-instance-name specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Displays IGMP configurations and state information in all instances.
-
